org.jboss.windup.reporting.freemarker

Interface WindupFreeMarkerTemplateDirective

  • All Superinterfaces:
    freemarker.template.TemplateDirectiveModel, freemarker.template.TemplateModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RenderApplicationPieChartDirective, RenderLinkDirective, RenderRuleLinkDirective, WriteToDiskDirective

    public interface WindupFreeMarkerTemplateDirective
extends freemarker.template.TemplateDirectiveModel
    This interface provides us with a way of looking up all TemplateDirectiveModel implementations within various windup-related addons. This makes it possible for windup-addons to provide extension methods that can be easily accessed by the freemarker templates.
    Author:
    Jesse Sightler, Lincoln Baxter, III

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface freemarker.template.TemplateModel

        NOTHING

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDescription()
      This should return a description of what this directive does, along with any required parameters.
      String getDirectiveName()
      Returns the name to be used for the function inside of freemarker.
      void setContext(GraphRewrite event)
      Set the current GraphRewrite event to use for TemplateDirectiveModel.execute(freemarker.core.Environment, java.util.Map, freemarker.template.TemplateModel[], freemarker.template.TemplateDirectiveBody)
